title: Histograms and Boxplots: Donut Sales
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

The two boxplots above represent the number of dozens of donuts sold per day for the same $120$ day period in both $2010$ and in $2011$ for a donut shop in Milwaukee.
If two histograms were created from these two box plots, which of the following statements would be true?

choices.text: The histogram for $2011$ would be left skewed.
The histogram for $2010$ would be nearly symmetrical.
The histogram for $2011$ would have a center to the right of the $2010$ histogram center.
The two histograms would have similar shapes.
The range of values of the two histograms would be quite different from each other.
